tech_news.title: The Legacy of Lara Croft Continues in Two New Tomb Raider Games - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: 30 years after it all started, Lara Croft returns in one new adventure, Tomb Raider: Catalyst (2027) and a complete reimagining of her first, Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis (2026). Learn more inside:

tech_news.title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight Release Date Announced | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN
tech_news.description: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight emerged from the shadows this evening at The Game Awards with a new trailer, revealing the anticipated adventure's release date.

tech_news.title: Gang of Dragon is Toshihiro Nagoshi's New Game, and It Sure Looks Like Yakuza | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN
tech_news.description: We just got our first look at the debut game from Nagoshi Studio, the studio formed by Toshihiro Nagoshi under NetEase after he departed Ryu Ga Gotoku in 2021. It's called Gang of Dragon, and it sure looks an awful lot like Yakuza!
